| Method                                                  | Modifiers | Description                                                                                                                                       |
| ------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [get(key)](/api/filesystem/filesystem_2/get)            |           | GetCall without a key to get all disks. Pass a key to get a specific disk.                                                                        |
